name: Balls Shooter 3D
description:
Balls shooting 3d is a casual and very addicting game.

Just tap and hold to shoot balls towards towers and crash stacks. Don’t hit cars on the tracks.

There are a lot of colorful scenes that keep you from getting bored.

Features:
- Easy to play - just hold and shoot.
- Beautiful scene and colorful themes.
- Infinite levels and a lot of fun.
